title: Phantom
writer: Hussain Zaidi, Kabir Khan, Parveez Sheikh
short_cast: Saif Ali Khan, Katrina Kaif, Sabyasachi Chakraborty, Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub, Sohaila Kapoor, Denzil Smith

desc: India's primary intelligence agency sends an enigmatic operative on a top-secret mission to avenge the 11/26 terrorist attack on Mumbai.
